fields.name: isActive
docs: items can be staked, rewards accrue (1)

fields.name: maxStakersCount
docs: The max number of NFTs that can be staked (8)

fields.name: currentStakersCount
docs: The current number of NFTs staked (8)

fields.name: uri
docs: uri link to offchain distribution log (4 + 63)

fields.name: collection
docs: the collection the emission belongs to (32)

fields.name: reward
docs: The record of the current and the previous reward emissions (4 + 8)

fields.name: rewardChangeTime
docs: The record of the time when the emission changed (4 + 8)

fields.name: endTime
docs: The period for which the staking is funded (1 + 8)

fields.name: stakedWeight
docs: Accrued weight of the staked NFTs (16)

fields.name: currentBalance
docs: the current balance for this emission (8)

fields.name: minimumPeriod
docs: The minimum stake period to be eligible for reward in seconds (1 + 8)

fields.name: stakedItems
docs: number of staked items using this emission (8)

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump of the NFT Record PDA (1)

fields.name: bump
docs: bump for the program config account (1)

fields.name: staker
docs: staker that this record belongs to (32)

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump of the Stake Record PDA (1)

fields.name: name
docs: name of the project, max 50 chars (50 + 4)

fields.name: subscriptionLiveDate
docs: Date the subscription will become live (8)

fields.name: tokenAuthBump
docs: The bump of the token authority PDA (1)

fields.name: nftAuthBump
docs: The bump of the NFT authority PDA (1)

fields.name: tokenMint
docs: optional token mint with mint auth (1 + 32)

fields.name: nextPaymentTime
docs: timestamp the next payment is due  (8)

errors.name: SlugTooLong
errors.msg: Slug must be max 50 chars

errors.name: SlugRequired
errors.msg: Slug must be provided

errors.name: NameTooLong
errors.msg: Name must be max 50 chars

errors.name: NameRequired
errors.msg: Name must be provided

errors.name: ProfanityDetected
errors.msg: Profanity cannot be used in a name

errors.name: SlugExists
errors.msg: Slug already exists - contact us if you think this is an error

errors.name: InsufficientBalanceInVault
errors.msg: insuficient balance for new staking duration, add funds before extending

errors.name: StakeOver
errors.msg: this STAKE is completed

errors.name: StakeNotLive
errors.msg: this STAKE is not yet live

errors.name: MaxStakersReached
errors.msg: max stakers have been reached

errors.name: StakeInactive
errors.msg: this staker is inactive

errors.name: CollectionInactive
errors.msg: this collection is inactive

errors.name: CollectionActive
errors.msg: this collection is still inactive

errors.name: InvalidCollection
errors.msg: nft is not included in the allowed collection

errors.name: CollectionNotVerified
errors.msg: collection must be verified

errors.name: TokenNotNFT
errors.msg: token is not an NFT

errors.name: NoRewardMint
errors.msg: no reward mint has been configured for this stake

errors.name: InvalidRewardToken
errors.msg: unexpected reward token

errors.name: UnexpectedRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: unexpected number of remaining accounts

errors.name: TokenAccountEmpty
errors.msg: token account must contain 1 token

errors.name: NegativePeriodValue
errors.msg: the minimum staking period in seconds can't be negative

errors.name: InvalidStakeEndTime
errors.msg: stake ends time must be greater than the current time and the start time

errors.name: StakeEndTimeRequired
errors.msg: Stake end time required if using a token vault

errors.name: StartTimeInPast
errors.msg: start time cannot be in the past

errors.name: TooManyStakers
errors.msg: max stakers can't be higher than the total collection size

errors.name: NotEnoughStakers
errors.msg: max stakers must be larger than 0

errors.name: FailedTimeConversion
errors.msg: failed to convert the time to i64

errors.name: StakeBumpError
errors.msg: unable to get stake details bump

errors.name: ProgramSubError
errors.msg: unable to subtract the given values

errors.name: ProgramMulError
errors.msg: unable to multiply the given values

errors.name: ProgramDivError
errors.msg: unable to divide the given values

errors.name: ProgramAddError
errors.msg: unable to add the given values

errors.name: MinimumPeriodNotReached
errors.msg: minimum staking period not reached

errors.name: InstructionBuilderFailed
errors.msg: failed to build instruction

errors.name: PaymentNotDueYet
errors.msg: payment isn't yet due

errors.name: NoPaymentDue
errors.msg: no payment due

errors.name: AdminOnly
errors.msg: only the system admin can use this instruction

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: the current signer doesn't have permission to perform this action

errors.name: MaxCollections
errors.msg: this STAKE has reached its maximum collections

errors.name: UpdateAuthRequired
errors.msg: update authority approval is required for minimum-term locking

errors.name: LockingPeriodTooLong
errors.msg: enforced locking period cannot be longer than 1 year

errors.name: LockingPeriodTooShort
errors.msg: enforced locking period must be longer than 1 second

errors.name: InvalidProgramData
errors.msg: an invalid programData account was provided

errors.name: StakeInArrears
errors.msg: addons cannot be added to a STAKE in arrears

errors.name: DurationRequired
errors.msg: duration is required if using a token vault

errors.name: DurationTooShort
errors.msg: duration must me more than 0

errors.name: CannotExtendNoEndDate
errors.msg: cannot extend as no end date set

errors.name: CollectionsMissing
errors.msg: all linked collections must be passed in remaining accounts

errors.name: EmissionsMissing
errors.msg: all emissions must be passed in remaining accounts

errors.name: NoTokensToClaim
errors.msg: There are no tokens to claim for this collection

errors.name: CollectionHasStakers
errors.msg: There are still active stakers who have yet to claim

errors.name: InvalidSlug
errors.msg: Slug must be a valid URL slug

errors.name: InvalidImage
errors.msg: Only accepts full arweave images

errors.name: ImageTooLong
errors.msg: Max 63 chars

errors.name: InvalidColor
errors.msg: Only hexadecimal colors are accepted - eg 0BFFD0

errors.name: StillHasCollections
errors.msg: Cannot close a staker that still has collections

errors.name: StillHasStakedItems
errors.msg: Cannot close a staker that still has staked items

errors.name: FrontLoadNotLocked
errors.msg: Tokens can only be front loaded with enforced minimum period emissions

errors.name: InvalidEmissions
errors.msg: Selected emission(s) do not exist

errors.name: InvalidEmissionPeriods
errors.msg: One or more selected emissions is not active

errors.name: NoEmissionsToAdd
errors.msg: At least one emission must be provided

errors.name: NoMinPeriodWithOption
errors.msg: Minimum period cannot by used with multiple option emissions

errors.name: RewardRequired
errors.msg: Reward required with this emission type

errors.name: InvalidEmission
errors.msg: Invalid emission

errors.name: EmissionSelectionRequired
errors.msg: A selection is required for this emission

errors.name: InvalidIndex
errors.msg: This index is invalid

errors.name: SelectionEmissionExists
errors.msg: Only one selection type emission can exist per collection

errors.name: StillHasEmissions
errors.msg: This collection still has active emissions

errors.name: NoAuthority
errors.msg: The program doesn't have mint auth for this token

errors.name: EmissionNotActive
errors.msg: This emission is not active

errors.name: TokenMintRequired
errors.msg: This emission type needs a token mint

errors.name: TokenExists
errors.msg: This collection already has a token

errors.name: TokenVaultRequired
errors.msg: Token vault address is required

errors.name: InvalidCreator
errors.msg: Invalid creator for NFT

errors.name: LabelTooLong
errors.msg: Label max length is 20 chars

errors.name: AmountTooLow
errors.msg: Amount must be greater than 0

errors.name: TotalSharesFunded
errors.msg: The total shares have already been funded for this distribution

errors.name: DistributionInactive
errors.msg: This distribution is inactive

errors.name: DistributionIncomplete
errors.msg: This distribution hasn't been completed yet

errors.name: InvalidInstruction
errors.msg: This instruction cannot be used for this asset type

errors.name: NonCustodialOnly
errors.msg: This asset type can only be staked non-custodially
